FOYER.name: Foyer
FOYER.desc:
Holloween night. The spookiest of nights. And you happen to be trapped in the foyer of a haunted mansion, the front door locked tight behind you. You must escape!
You see a door to your front and left, and an open doorway to the right.

STAIRSDOWN.name: Bottom of the Stairwell
STAIRSDOWN.desc: The bottom of a flight of rickety wooden stairs. When you're at rock bottom, the only way to go is up, right?

DINERM.name: Dining Room
DINERM.desc:
A dining room with a large table, covered in rotten food, and with only two lonely chairs. Smells nasty.
There's another door in front of you, one behind, and a flimsy looking one to the right.

LIVRM.name: Living Room
LIVRM.desc:
A living room with a cold fireplace, a moth-eaten chair, and an old teddy bear that seems to have had its insides violently removed.
As you stand in the corner, there's a door on either side of you.

KITCH.name: Kitchen
KITCH.desc:
A kitchen with knives and rot strewn about. If the dining room smelled bad, this is ten times worse.
There's a heavy metel door to the left. It eminates heat.

BOILRM.name: Boiler Room
BOILRM.desc: The door closes with an unsettling thunk, and  you descend some stairs. At the bottom is a boiler, somehow still functioning... It'S getting really hot down here...

BACKYD.name: Backyard
BACKYD.desc:
Finally! Fresh air! There's a wilted garden here... And some graves.
Thankfully, there are also paths to your right and left.

ZALLEY.name: Path
ZALLEY.desc: As you walk down the path, half-decayed hands spring from the dirt and grab at you! How will you defend yourself?

DALLEY.name: Alleyway
DALLEY.desc:
As you exit the backyard and turn into the alley, you see an old doghouse, with a chain running from it... To a sleeping, spectral monster dog.
The chains are bunched up by the doghouse. How do you pass?

STAIRSUP.name: Top of the Stairwell
STAIRSUP.desc: The top of the stairs. You can see four doors and a window. Are windows doors? They are if you jump out them.

CLOS.name: Closet
CLOS.desc: You open the door cautiously... Suddenly, a skeleton jumps out with a trombone! It blasts four notes at you, jumps back in, and slams the door.

GRLRM.name: Girl's Room
GRLRM.desc:
You open the door, entering what looks to be the room of a small girl. There are many stuffed animals strewn about in multile pieces.
Out of the corner of your eye you think you spot a small girl, but when you turn, she's gone.

GSTRM.name: Guest Room
GSTRM.desc: You open the door. This seems to be a guest room, though by the looks of it, it's never been used. Or has it?

MASRM.name: Master Room
MASRM.desc:
You open the door, entering a master bedroom. It's in complete disarray. As you creep forwards, there's a bright flash and the ghost of a man appears!
'Fool! Begone from my house or I shall tear your soul asunder!'

SECPAS.name: Secret Passage
SECPAS.desc: Aha! In the back wall is a secret door with a chute leading down! There's a thin black powder around it.

DEAD.name: end. You die in the most horrible way imaginable within the bounds of your current location.

END.name: Street
END.desc:
FREEDOM! You run forth into the road, past trick-or-treaters. You glance back, only for the mansion to be gone, a contruction site in its place.
That's the last time you choose trick over treat!
